ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Class Group

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Group
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
PhysicsGroup, TransformGroup
public abstract class Group
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node

A group is an abstract superclass for all the nodes in a GraphSceneManager that do not contain an actual shape but rather a collection of child nodes. It can contain several children, which can be groups or leaves. It can be rotated and translated. All of the transformations are applied to all of the children before rendering.
